channel.title: Sam Roberts
channel.description:
Sam Roberts is Canadian, and he got pretty popular here.
It seems to me that outside of Canada, people don't really know about them. One of my favorite bands and in my opinion the songs are pretty deep, so try these:
Probably my favorite: The Gate - http://youtube.com/watch?v=HWrzXJkQJdw
And also probably my favorite, Mind Flood. Couldn't find a youtube link, download it.
Brother Down - http://youtube.com/watch?v=DCClbR1ZORo
Hard Road - http://youtube.com/watch?v=d0RniSNWdYM
Bridge to Nowhere - http://youtube.com/watch?v=Z2HihW_jdUQ (sound quality is kinda fucked on this one)
These are all great songs, theres many more that aren't on youtube.

item.title: Sam Roberts
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Yeah if it’s not your type of music then you probably wouldn’t enjoy it. I’m not sure, but it feels like a lot of it is drug inspired. I find to truly enjoy his music, you need to get a good understanding of the lyrics (understanding != knowing). A lot of it is pretty deep.

My brother went to school with two of the band members. They’ve even been over to my house when I was little.

Read full topic
